title: $FOLKS Dashboard
takeaway: Developed a dashboard to showcase $FOLKS token launch
description: This project analyzes the $FOLKS token launch as a crosschain token which was lauched with Wormhole NTT to transfer seamless between chains.

title: Algorand Developer Dashboard
takeaway: Developed a dashboard to showcase Algorand developer activity
description: This project analyzes the Algorand developer activity through Electic Capital methodology and reviews the top developers and their open source activity.

title: Alpha Arcade Dashboard
takeaway: Developed a dashboard to showcase Alpha Arcade protocol
description: This project analyzes the Alpha Arcade protocol through its onchain activity generated by the protocol, giving a view of their top markets, the volume generated and the fees generated as well as reviewing their token.

title: Tinyman Dashboard
takeaway: Developed a dashboard to showcase Tinyman protocol
description: This project analyzes the Tinyman protocol through its onchain activity generated by the protocol, giving a view of their top pools and their staking activity.

title: Github Developer Dynamics
takeaway: Analyzed development activity impact on 6 AI crypto projects
description: This project analyzes the effect of development activity on 6 AI crypto projects by examining token price correlations and Reddit sentiment data.

title: Deciphering Crypto Trends
takeaway: Forecasted crypto trends using Google search data with 75% accuracy
description: OCEAN Data Challenge competition project analyzing Google Trends for cryptocurrencies and their relation to token prices, with ML-based trend forecasting.
